attributes.action: Call for general election following government parties during lockdowns
attributes.additional_details: This is not about any ongoing investigations but a call for a full public say in to who should lead the country rather than the standing government. My lack of confidence is due to the perception of "one rule does not fit all" following parties alongside the perception of "cronyism". A public vote is the only acceptable way forward.
attributes.background: I call on a national general election to have a say in who runs this country. This is gollowing all the revelations of parties in various government buildings during regional and national lockdowns.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/606033

You might also like to sign these petitions:

'Introduce legislation to create mechanism for the voters to dissolve Parliament': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/597718

''Make it a requirement for a general election to be held when a PM leaves office': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603334

Change the law, so that UK citizens can force an immediate General Election': https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/603106
